title: Solomon Asks for Wisdom
summary: Solomon offers sacrifices at Gibeon, where God appears to him in a dream. Solomon asks for wisdom to govern well. God grants his request and promises wealth and honor. Solomon soon shows his wisdom in judging a dispute between two women over a baby.

faq.question: What did Solomon ask for from God?
faq.answer: Wisdom to govern the people with justice.

faq.question: How did Solomon show his wisdom?
faq.answer: By suggesting to divide a baby in two to reveal the true mother.
